name: 2nd CME Cardiologists Conference
content: 2nd CME Cardiologists Conference (CARDIO 2024), taking place in Dubai, UAE on April 29-30, 2024, is one of the Cardiologists premier conference covering the fields of cardiology and cardiovascular medicine. The primary purpose of the Cardiologists Conference is to provide the practicing physicians, researchers and heart care team with a concentrated exposure to the latest innovations and skills in cardiology to positively influence patient outcomes.
